rows.label: tlk401001_msg0001
rows.name:
In the current climate, I fear
almost anything could happen.

rows.label: tlk401001_msg0002
rows.name:
I can scarcely wait for the day when
that huge, awful Divine Beast battleship
is gone from our shores.

rows.label: tlk401001_msg0003
rows.name:
It pains me to even see such an
unsightly structure in our beautiful city.

rows.label: tlk401001_msg0004
rows.name:
I am sure all upstanding Acedian
citizens resent its presence.

rows.label: tlk401001_msg0005
rows.name:
Why can Superbia and Invidia not
cease all this foolish conflict and simply
submit themselves to the will of Acedia?
